text: @GOPLeader @DonaldJTrumpJr Democrats gave warnings, Trump compared it to impeachment & the Mueller investigation. “This is their new hoax,” he declared at a rally on February 28th. Trump played golf eight times from mid-January to early March, as the coronavirus crisis got worse. https://t.co/siu8LIzXCA
